column4: Hey my card reader is shown in Disk utility program but it is not listed in fdisk how can I mount it
Hey my card reader is shown in Disk utility program but it is not listed in fdisk how can I mount it
if you run:   lsusb   you should see the card reading controller, you can find guides using the 8 character hex id. Also try rebooting with the SD card in the reader
no . it is working in windows
so what windows does is of near zero value
sudo apt-get repository ppa:raof/aubergine; sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get upgrade
compiz had crashed several times due to seg fault
i installed maverick 32 bit version in my 64 bit machine(Intel Dual core E5400).then  i upgraded to natty. when i update kernel later i came to know that my machine is 64 bit
try:   sudo add-apt-repository ppa:linaro-maintainers/overlay; sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get upgrade
